title: Remove tab options from Designers and Design Packages menu

requirements.text: Remove the tab navigation interface from the Designers and Design Packages dropdown menu in the site header, replacing it with a simpler dropdown list that directly links to the Designers page and Design Packages page

quotes: remove tab options from Desingers and Design packages menu

acceptanceCriteria: The dropdown menu in SiteHeader no longer displays tabs
Both 'Designers' and 'Design Packages' appear as simple list items in the dropdown
Clicking 'Designers' navigates directly to the designers directory page
Clicking 'Design Packages' navigates directly to the packages page
The dropdown maintains the same visual styling as other site navigation elements

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the destinations of the menu links
Modifying the overall header layout or styling
